name: Anobeass

projects.title: Uqdat Visual identity | عقدة هوية بصرية

services.title: Book Covers Designing
services.description: We specialize in the creation and development of captivating book cover designs, with a strong focus on visually appealing and impactful aesthetics that bring stories to life.

services.title: Logo Designing
services.description: We design unique logos that capture the essence of your brand, creating memorable and distinctive visuals that set your brand apart from competitors.

services.title: Visual identity
services.description: We create comprehensive visual identities that encompass logo design, color palettes, typography, and other essential design elements, ensuring your brand communicates its values and stands out in the market.

services.title: Brand Strategy
services.description: We craft comprehensive brand strategies and complete brand identities that define your brand's vision, mission, and values, along with its visual components. Our approach ensures a cohesive narrative and impactful presence that engages your audience and sets you apart in the marketplace.

aboutpara: Graphic Designer with 5+ years of experience in book cover design, logo design, typography, thumbnails, visual identities, and social media posts. Skilled at creating impactful and effective visual content.

resume.description: Graphic Designer with 5+ years of experience in book cover design, logo design, typography, thumbnails, visual identities, and social media posts. Skilled at creating impactful and effective visual content.

education.universityPara: A specialized educational institution offering the Egyptian curriculum to the children of the Egyptian community in Saudi Arabia.

others: Willingness to learn and continuous improvement
